problem.p: Two identical balls with different initial speeds slide down two frictionless tracks of the same height but different angles, and then reach the bottom. Which of the following quantities is (are) equal for these two processes?

choice.name: foil1
choice.p: The work done by the earth

choice.name: foil2
choice.p: The change in the ball's kinetic energy

choice.name: foil13
choice.p: The change in the ball's speed

choice.name: foil1\4
choice.p: The change in the ball's kinetic energy & the change in the ball's speed

choice.name: foil5
choice.p: The change in the ball's kinetic energy & the work done by the earth

choice.name: foil6
choice.p: The change in the ball's speed & the work done by the earth
